reviewText: Only six episodes...

Color is looking lovely & it's set in Paris with all the recognizable sites. I don't like the fact that the characters are even thinner than Barbie dolls - even the boy hero is skinny & in costume looks like a girl. Voices are American so that could be the reason but would rather see them drawn with a little more weight on them. Not the best image for girls but of course my granddaughter consciously doesn't notice.

I like the show.

I just wanna know, on the dvd I have the image is cut so it only shows about 4/5 of the image and it don't help zooming out.
I 'am I the only one who has this problem?

I had this preordered and was not disappointed. In addition to including both the French and English audio we expect with Ladybug, the DVD also included a tiny little comic of Evillustrator, which was not expected.
Overall, Season 1: Volume 2 was just as good as the first volume. Plus, Amazon got my delivery to me on time even though it was a holiday.
Adventurous and Thrilling.

According to Shout, the episodes on this discs are:
1
Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir: The Evillustrator
2
Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir: Rogercop
3
Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir: Dark Cupid
4
Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir: Horrificator
5
Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir: Darkblade
6
Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir: The Mime
one of the best shows I have seen in a long time. I'm 22 and totally obsessed, I recommend it to everyone. Amazing and witty dialogue, good animation and hilarious scenes.

My four year old son loves this show. Not too much violence. Good take on super heroes. I find myself enjoying this show as well. There are so many puns. It's hard to not fall for the chemistry between the two heroes!
Great series!
I love this series. It's just so, so good and so much fun. I love the strong characters, the jokes, the designs. Do yourself a favor and give it a watch!
Great entertainment for my granddaughters.
gift to granddaughter, loved it
My grand daughter likes this and it is not violent; a bit scary perhaps for the very young.  My gd is 5 and is not scared.
Daughter loves it , so much that we are scattering the internet looking for somewhere we can get Miraculous Lady Bug party supplies for her birthday.
I love this show, it is so awesome

I love this show and was so happy when I got this! It delivered quickly and it was in very good condition. I am sad that there are only 6 episodes and not the whole first season but I'm still glad I got it.
I love this show! This was a great buy!
It arrived just fine, disc is in perfect condition, but the case was broken upon arrival when I opened it up.
Came very quickly & my children loved it
My niece was very pleased to see a girl superhero. Only complaint, I wish they had translation subs for the French dub. The only subtitles available are for the English dub.
Great DVD
My daughters (and I) love this series!!!!  We binged the series on Netflix, but I got the DVD for car trips :)

This is an amazing dvd,but it's too bad they didn't just put the entire season in one dvd boxset.
But,like Disney,who puts only a few episodes of each show on dvd like:
Austin and Ally,
 suite life on deck got only one dvd release,etc.
They figure they'll make more money by separating them into three different dvds.
Making us fan's have to search forever for every episode and pay more for it,too.
That's right:  season one of miraculous is three different dvds.
You have to search awhile before finding the green one with both ladybug and cat noir on the cover.
The other one's show up pretty easily.
Anyway,i highly recommend buying all of them,since there's no other way to get each episode.
Plus, once you watch all these,you'll be wanting more.
My son and I both enjoy these cartoons and this DVD is some episodes we haven't seen before! Arriston is 6 and he likes Cat Noir of course and it helps with his imagination... LOVE
My college age daughter loves this
My granddaughter watches this DVD all the time!
Christmas present one of my granddaughter wanted.
